item.title: Allow me to introduce myself
item.description: Hi, my name is Jens. I’m born on the 4th of July and currently live in Mechelen, Belgium ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡ª. I’m a junior systems- and network administrator with a recently developed passion for PowerShell. I’m currently employed as IT Officer at Mobix Engema. Want to reach me? Shoot me a message via me@jensmaes.be or connect with me on LinkedIn Skillset My skills are as followed but I’m never afraid of a challenge to learn something new!
